text: The 1953 Volta a Catalunya was the 33rd edition of the Volta a Catalunya cycle race and was held from 6 September to 13 September 1953. The race started in Montjuïc and finished in Barcelona. The race was won by Salvador Botella. ==General classification== {| |Final general classification {| class="wikitable" |- ! scope="col" | Rank ! scope="col" | Rider ! scope="col" | Time |- | style="text-align:center;" | 1 | | style="text-align:right;" | |- | style="text-align:center;" | 2 | | style="text-align:right;" | + 2' 46" |- | style="text-align:center;" | 3 | | style="text-align:right;" | + 3' 16" |- | style="text-align:center;" | 4 | | style="text-align:right;" | + 5' 42" |- | style="text-align:center;" | 5 | | style="text-align:right;" | + 7' 58" |- | style="text-align:center;" | 6 | | style="text-align:right;" | + 8' 53" |- | style="text-align:center;" | 7 | | style="text-align:right;" | + 9' 59" |- | style="text-align:center;" | 8 | | style="text-align:right;" | + 13' 20" |- | style="text-align:center;" | 9 | | style="text-align:right;" | + 14' 01" |- | style="text-align:center;" | 10 | | style="text-align:right;" | + 19' 32" |} |} ==References== 1953 Volta Category:1953 in Spanish road cycling Category:September 1953 sports events
